import React,{Fragment} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Moment from 'react-moment' import {connect} from 'react-redux' const PostItem = ({post:{_id,text,name, avatar, user, likes, comments,date},auth}) => { return (

{name}

{text}

Posted on {date}

Discussion {comments.length} {auth.isAuthendicated ? ( ) : null }
); } const mapStatetoProps=(state)=>{ return {auth:state.auth} } export default connect(mapStatetoProps, {})(PostItem);
